name: xbot-js
description: An automated Twitter bookmark manager using Puppeteer.

scripts.old-build: tsc --project tsconfig.esm.json && find dist/esm -name '*.js' -exec bash -c 'mv "$0" "${0%.js}.mjs"' {} \; && find dist/esm -name '*.mjs' -exec sed -i '' -E "s|(from ['\"]\.\/.+?)(?<!\.mjs)(['\"])|\1.mjs\2|g" {} +
scripts.patch:esm: find dist/esm -name '*.js' -exec bash -c 'mv "$0" "${0%.js}.mjs"' {} \; && find dist/esm -name '*.mjs' -exec sed -i '' -E "s|(from ['\"]\./[^'\"]+)(['\"])|\1.mjs\2|g" {} \;
